verses.1: Amaute Egypt gam panin a paikhiat zawh uh a kum nihna a kha masa sungin Sinai sehnel gamah Topa in Moses kiangah,
verses.2: “A kiseh hunin Paisan Pawi, Israel mite khamsak in.
verses.3: A kiseh hun, tu kha ni sawm le li ni nitakin a thukhamte le a ngeina kip omte bangin na kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.4: Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Paisan Pawi a kham nadingun Moses in Israel mite tungah a gen hi.
verses.5: Amaute in a kha masa, a ni sawm le li ni nitakin Sinai sehnel gamah Paisan Pawi kham uh a, Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin Israel mite a gamta uh hi.
verses.6: Misi luang a lawnna uh hangin a nin mi pawl khat om uh a, tua ni-in amaute in Paisan Pawi kham thei lo uh ahih manin Moses le Aaronʼ mai ah pai uh hi.
verses.7: Tua mite in, “Misi luang lawnna hangin ka nin uh hi. Ahi ta zongin bang hangin a kiseh hunin Israel midangte tawh Topa biakna hong kipiasak khawm lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.8: Moses in amaute kiangah, “Noteʼ thu tawh kisai, Topaʼ thupiak ka zak dong na ngak dih un,” a ci hi.
verses.10: “Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Noteʼ lakah mi khatpeuh ahi a, na suanlekhakte uh khatpeuh in ahi zongin misi luang lawnna hangin a nin ahi a, khualzinin gamlapi ah a om ahi zongin, Topa adingin Paisan Pawi kham veve ding hi.
verses.11: A kha nihna a ni sawm le li ni nitakin amaute in kham ding uh a, amaute in silngo sawh loh anlum le a kha meh tawh ne ding uh hi.
verses.12: Amaute in a zingsang dong bangmah siit lo ding uh a, a guh khat zong sutan lo ding uh hi. Paisan Pawi ngeinate tawh kizui-in amaute in a kham ding uh hi.
verses.13: Ahih hangin a siang mi khat khualzin lo napi-in Paisan Pawi a kham kei leh, amah in a kiseh hunin Topa biakna pia lo ahih manin a mite lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi. Tua mi in ama khialhna mah thuak ding hi.
verses.14: “Noteʼ lakah khualmi khat hong peemin, Topa adingin Paisan Pawi a kham le Paisan Pawi thukhamte le a ngeina kipte bangin hih ding hi. Peemta le tualsung mite adingin ngeina a kibang na neikhawm ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.15: Biakbuk a kidinsak ni-in meii in thuciamna biakbuk tuam a, nitak a kipan a zingsang dong meikuang tawh kibangin biakbuk tung sanah a om hi.
verses.16: Tua bangin om den hi. Sunin meii in tuam a, zanin mei tawh a kibang khat in tuam hi.
verses.17: Puanbuk tung san panin meii a kilaktoh khit ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh a, meii a kiphuhna munah Israel mite in giahphual a sat uh hi.
verses.18: Topa in thu a piak ciangin Israel mite ding khia uh a, Topa in thu a piak ciangin amaute in giahphual a sat uh hi. Biakbuk tung sanah meii a khawl lai teng, amaute zong giahphual ah om uh hi.
verses.19: Biakbuk tungah ni tampi sung meii a om khinta zongin Israel mite in Topaʼ thupiakna zui-in ding khia tuan lo uh hi.
verses.20: Biakbuk tungah ni tawmno sung bek meii om thei zel hi. Tua bang ciangin zong Topaʼ thupiak bangin giahphual ah amaute tawmno sung mah omin, Topaʼ thupiakna bangin amaute a ding khia uh hi.
verses.21: Khat veivei nitak a kipan zingsang dong tua meii om hi. Zingsangin meii a kilaktoh ciangin amaute ding khia uh a, tua ahih kei leh, sun khat le zan khat a om lai le zong, meii a kilaktoh hunhunin amaute ding khia uh hi.
verses.22: Ni nih ahi a, kha khat ahi a, a hun sau zaw ahi zongin biakbuk tung sanah meii a khawl lai teng giahphual ah Israel mite omin ding khia lo uh a, ahih hangin a kilaktoh peuh ciangin amaute ding khia uh hi.
verses.23: Topaʼ thupiakna tawh amaute in giahphual sat uh a, Topaʼ thupiakna mah tawh amaute ding khia uh hi. Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amaute in Topaʼ thu a mang uh hi.
